data.message: Sorry for leaving a msg disregard to the original post as i just hope to drive attention from facebook team to solve my problem of incapability showing“on this day” in my FB, which i have already seeked for help millions time these several months....Could ur team kindly assist and help to fix the problem for me? Deeply appreciated.

replies.message: Hey, CoroZoe. Thanks for bringing this to our attention. This sounds like a feature issue. Please help us track these issues and submit the problem to support through our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2eczHms. -Rhea

Thanks for reply. Indeed i tried to seek help from Help Center before but no feedback at all. So, may i ask when will FB team check and fix the issue for me after my report again there? Actually, the problem was solved suddenly 3 months ago after i repeatedly sent msg thru messenger and fb page, though no one replied me, my “on that day” appeared suddenly by lasting just 2 days. It disappeared again after till now.....Anyway, is that i should post the feature issue i encountered in “What happens when I report that something isn't working on Facebook”? Thanks so much.
Facebook Hello Facebook I love Facebook madly
Facebook can u pls advise how i can submit my enquiry in details in help center? Seems there ar no fields for me to type the issue mentioned above, thx
Facebook Hello Facebook I love Facebook madly
